column28: 1. Have you or an immediate family member or other close contact ever been diagnosed or treated for tuberculosis? (ig_ER.ER_OCCUR_DX_TRT_TB1)
column30:
2. Have you lived in or had prolonged travels to countries in the following regions:
● Sub-Saharan Africa
● India
● China
● Mexico
● Southeast Asia or Micronesia
● The former Soviet Union (ig_ER.ER_OCCUR_TRVL_REG2)
column32: 3. Have you lived or worked in a prison, homeless shelter, immigration center, or nursing home? (ig_ER.ER_OCCUR_FACILITY3)
column34:
4. Have you, or an immediate family member, had any of the following problems for the past 3 weeks or longer:
● Chronic Cough
● Production of Sputum
● Blood-Streaked Sputum
● Unexplained Weight Loss
● Fever
● Fatigue/Tiredness
● Night Sweats
● Shortness of Breath
(ig_ER.ER_OCCUR_SYMP_GE3W4)
column36: If modified from copy, add details into Default for this field (ig_ER._R_COPYMOD)

column31: Lived or Worked in a Prison, Homeless Shelter/refugee camp, Immigration Center, healthcare worked in a Hospital or Nursing Home
